column4: I am trying to resize a windows but every time it take 30 sec to move the mouse on the one pixel of the border ?   Can't be like that by default, Should I reinstall ?
I am trying to resize a windows but every time it take me ~30 sec to move the mouse on the correct pixel on the border.  Is it like that by default? Should I reinstall ?
sounds like you are a little short on memory for the environment you are trying to run
and no, waiting 30 seconds for a resize cursor is not normal
